thread.title: Sybil
thread.title_full: LD Mountain Centre reviewed by Sybil

author: Sybil
title: Sybil
text: Mountain Equipment rupal jacket red. Very good price for quality jacket. Easy online ordering. Courier service they use was excellent.Speedy delivery. I wasn't going to be in and was offered neighbours or pick up location (chemist near my work) or another date. Jacket as described. I've not tried in the wet yet.
